content.raw:
It turns out that `ign log record` wasn't missing any messages. Instead, `ign log playback` simply wasn't waiting after advertisement before it started to publish messages. As a result, the `./subscribe` function kept missing the first message from `ign log playback` because it was coming in before `./subscribe` had a chance to actually subscribe.

This is fixed here: 3b37182
